#id=1
#text=I decided it was time to get my hair cut .
#id=2
#text=I wanted a new style and a shorter length .
#id=3
#text=I called the hair salon and made an appointment .
#id=4
#text=The stylist greeted me upon my arrival and directed me to sit at her station .
#id=5
#text=We discussed what style and length I wanted and I showed her a picture in a magazine as a reference .
#id=6
#text=She placed a fabric cape around my neck and directed me to wash bowls .
#id=7
#text=I sat in the wash chair , and leaned my head back into the bowl .
#id=8
#text=The stylist washed my hair and towel dried it , the directed me back to her station .
#id=9
#text=She combed my hair out and began to trim it with scissors .
#text=After she was finished cutting my hair , she blow dried it and styled it in the manner I asked .
#text=I paid her for the work and left a tip in her jar .
#text=I was very pleased with my new haircut .
